Package UserInterface

Class MovieListingUI

java.lang.Object
UserInterface.MovieListingUI
public class MovieListingUI extends Object
This is the Movie Listing Interface. This is imported to call the interface for the admin to be able to add/edit/delete the movie listing
Author:
GAN HAO YI, CHEW ZHI QI, SANSKKRITI JAIN

    Method

    static Movie
    createMovie()
    This method creates a new movie and returns an ArrayList of 2 movies
    static Movie
    deleteMovie(Movie movie)
    This function is used to get the admin user to input the movie details that they want to delete from the movies.txt database by changing the status to End Of Showing.
    static Movie

    This function is used to get the admin user to modify any movie details in the Movies.txt database.

    This is the Movie Listing Interface for the admin to access the Movie database and make any changes

  • Method Details

    • MovieListingInterface

      public static void MovieListingInterface(AllCineplex cineplexes) throws Exception
      This is the Movie Listing Interface for the admin to access the Movie database and make any changes
      Parameters:
      cineplexes - = includes the movies listed at the various cineplexes
      Throws:
      Exception - is thrown if there is an error in the implementation of any method.

    • printMovieList

      public static void printMovieList(ArrayList<Movie> listOfMovies)
      This function is implemented to print the entire movies database
      Parameters:
      listOfMovies - = contains the movies list and all details
      Throws:
      IOException - is thrown if there is an error in reading the file contents

    • createMovie

      public static Movie createMovie()
      This method creates a new movie and returns an ArrayList of 2 movies
      Returns:
      ArrayList of 2 movies, the first a 3D Movie, the second a 2D Movie.

    • modifyMovie

      public static Movie modifyMovie(Movie movie)
      This function is used to get the admin user to modify any movie details in the Movies.txt database.
      Parameters:
      movie - = movie whose details need to be changed
      Returns:
      the updated movie object

    • deleteMovie

      public static Movie deleteMovie(Movie movie)
      This function is used to get the admin user to input the movie details that they want to delete from the movies.txt database by changing the status to End Of Showing.
      Parameters:
      movie - = the movie they want to delete
      Returns:
      the movie object
